content.detailedDescription: It happened above the columbus indiana pallet corporation everyone who works there saw it!!!!!!!!!!Nothing ever seen like it before!!!Was not man made!Go speak to the employees! *(telephone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Columbus pallet corporation!!!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: So i was with my friends last night, and we were playing board games in my friend james' house. we go to james' house all the time, it's like our clubhouse. can adults have a clubhouse? nobody actually ever calls james' house a clubhouse though. kids have clubhouses, so this would be like an adult clubhouse. there aren't any membership dues or anything like that, it isn't a real club, but it is a real house. i know, i've been in it and touched it and stuff. so we're in james' house, and i heard this weird whirring noise, but i ignored it because we were in a really heated discussion about what board game to play. i like clue, but nobody else really likes it. i like to think that if they would just take the game seriously, it would be fun and full of mystery and intrigue, but we usually just end up wanting to watch the movie clue. it's alright, not great. it has that guy from home alone, i think he worked in the hotel? i guess he was the villain, it's been awhile since i've seen home alone though, i don't remember. so while we're arguing, i heard the whirring noise, but it was even louder, but my ears had been acting up ever since i went to that party where loud bands play in the basement. my friend devan was playing, so i got up real close to hear, but i ended up standing next to an amp, and my ears have been ringing ever since. so we decide to play the game tribond, which was a lot of fun. they read off three clues, and you have to figure out what connects them. so if your three clues were like, "baseball, the stock market, and former boston celtics superstar larry bird," then you would obviously answer, "things white people like". so you know, we're playing, having a good time and telling jokes, when this bright light shines down into the backyard of the house. but then we noticed that it was just the house's floodlights, and they were just triggered by an animal, probably a squirrel or something. maybe a deer. i don't know, it was dark. but i was really into the game, and i was close to winning. oh man, we had this joke that was so funny about governor chris christie, but i don't want to write it on the internet, or our friend muhammad might see it and ruin the joke. muhammad's a nice guy, but he repeats jokes until they aren't funny anymore. he's a joke killer. like if there was a prison for metaphors, muhammad would be serving 35 consecutive life sentences for his serial joke killing. so after a while, james wins the game, which was a bummer because i had just gotten a question right where the answer was, "soundtracks that feature songs by kenny loggins," so naturally i was pumped. but james came ahead to win it in the end, and it was tense. then we all had some snacks. i think i had chips and root beer, but it might have been teddy grahams and water. teddy grahams are good, but some flavors are just bland, you know? it's weird how so many people like crappy food. my grandpa likes anchovies on his pizza, how crazy is that? but all joking aside, it was a good time. as we all thanked james and got in our cars to leave, we all saw a chevron shaped object in the sky. on the ride home i listened to "subterranean homesick blues" by bob dylan. that's a good song.
content.summary: Chevon shaped object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in the northwest part of las vegas, nevada. i walked out into my backyard to smoke a cigarette, looked up at the stars & admire how beautiful the sky looked as i do every night. the sky was clear with no sign of clouds. i was outside for about 3 or 4 minutes & i started to notice something moving at a slow pace past the stars. as i continued to look at this object i saw that it was speeding up & then it slowed down & stopped completely. after that it made a complete circle then saw a bright white flash come from the object then it started to head south & vanished. i went running into my house to alert my husband as to what i saw. after yelling his name through the house he finally came downstairs & i proceeded to tell him what happened. we both went outside to look in the sky to see if it was still there. after about 1 minute my husband saw an object & pointed it out to me. we both saw it moving at a very fast pace then it stopped. it started to move back & forth & then another one appeared. both of them were circling around then the one on the left disappeared & the one on the right flashed a bright white light and was gone. we looked at each other in complete shock. we knew this could not be an airplane, helicopter, flare or weather balloon. these objects moved in ways that i have never seen before. i said to my husband, oh my god, those are ufos. we both became so excited & i started jumping up & down like a child. we kept looking in the sky for about 2-4 minutes & saw 2 more objects that were either the same objects from before or different ones. they were both just gliding slowly in the same direction. the one on the left stopped, made a quick left & was gone. the one to the right stayed in the sky for about 30 -45 seconds & was traveling east. the object stopped, flashed 2 times with a bright white light & disappeared. my husband & i are both believers & know what we saw last night. to us it doesn't matter what other people think. if people choose not to believe thats their problem not ours. i will remember that moment for the rest of my life. i believe this is just the beginning of what we will be seeing in the future. peace & love to all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 star-like objects appearing  & disappearing high in the sky some with white flashing lights moving rapidly, changing direction suddenly  & disappearing into thin air

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, you met through a friend and would like to review my video to see if what we saw in a certain event was real.

thanks and i'm waiting.

i'm from brazil and took place on may 14, 2011.
 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=u8k4orfokn4
 

regards.
content.summary: Jrf 2011 - ufo™ brazil [official]

content.detailedDescription: Just sitting out in the yard and i saw two faint small "stars" which were moving.. then they suddenly separated and moved apart in a "v" formation.. at the speed of a passing satelitte, i.E. not super fast. but strange movements for "stars"  i checked "human space sightings" website and there were no reported passing sateelittes overhead, at least for another 40 minutes and these did not act like satelittes passing overhead..Split in "v" formation. happened between 10 pm and 10:03 pm on may 24, 2011 in dandridge, tn
content.summary: Two "stars" split and travelled off in "v" formation

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out our picture window leaning on the back of the couch with my face up against the glass just star gazing and i just happen to notice some movement in the sky so i focused on the movement and it was three lights in a triangle formation moving slowly across the sky didnt really know what to think at first so i just kept watching for about a minute then decided i wanted someone else to see this so my mother was in the kitchen in the next room ,i didnt want to lose it so i got a really good fix on where it was and the direction and speed it was moving and quickly jumped off the couch ran to the corner and yelled at my mom to come quickly and look at something and returned to the couch in just a couple seconds put my face back at the window and found the object almost imediately as soon as i focused back on it the formation stopped and as soon as it stopped it took off up and at a slight angle out of sight in the blink of an eye, it left so fast that it left a light trace for an instant it was quite amazing and my mother never made it in time to see it, i was 12 or 13 at the time and now i am 50 and i can still remember it like it was yesterday i knew even at that age that it was something not from this world so it profoudly changed the way i think about things, i think thats why i'm so inteterested in the sciences it made me think outside the box and have wondered about it ever since. i also had a day time sighting  last summer.
content.summary: Saw formation moving across the night sky then saw it depart.

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to the train station i saw a black triangle object, it was under the height a plane usually is flying and doesn't make any sound... however first of all the sighting lasted just a few seconds (2-3 seconds) but it was close enough that i have been able to describe it to myself as triangle like and entirely black - with no light on it... however it was a alley so i lost the view on it, in this moment i rushed to the next crossroad where i had a better view, on this position i was able to see it again, but the position was far away, but still i recognized the object (it was about 30 seconds later), after short time i wasn't able to see it anymore.
i wasn't able to take a picture (unfortunately because it would be a kind of proof for triangle ufo's), but i drawed a sketch (it's not very exact, as the sighting lasted for a very short time, i made the sketch from the way i described the ufo to myself during the short close encounter).
the triangle was kinda cut-up, so it was triangle like but also a bit different, i tried to draw this as good as possible on my sketch.
content.summary: Fast black triangle over my head

content.detailedDescription: While potting flowers monday morning on the 16th of may i heard what sounded like a small ultra light aircraft somewhere overhead. we have one with a sail that flies around here a lot especially on week-ends so i am familiar with the sound. when i started looking up to try and spot him i saw another kind of craft coming from the south moving very slow and lower than most crafts would fly, barely topping the tree line. it was moving very slow and the sound seemed to be too loud. it was smaller than a small plane with swept back wings making it look more like a triangle but with prominent tail and nose. it looked metallic silver with patterns like joined plates together, it was that low. the nose is what was so different, it had a projection with a fairly wide cross piece making it look similar to a cross.The way it was moving i figured it was some sort of new plane that was using the nose to make pictures or record some type of information. my husband says maybe it was some sort of drone or some sort of new info gathering device.I watched it for about 3 minutes till it was out of sight. it just seem that the sound and the slowness was not normal for any plane or ultralight. i don't know what i saw but it was unusual for anything around here especially in the daytime.
content.summary: Bright patterned silver, swept back wings. nose had aprojection with cross bars

content.detailedDescription:
It was a rainy day with clouds in the sky. i came from outside and when gazed outside my 8th floor apartment's window i noticed a small black object( disc shaped) going from south to north direction. it was some unusual object and not the usual flight/balloon.

i tried to capture the video using my phone but in the moment of hurry and excitement, it was not possible and in the attached file one can see a glimpse of the object at 19 to 21 second.
content.summary: A disc shaped object noticed in the cloudy sky.

content.detailedDescription: I am in laguna niguel. i was looking roughly south east when i saw a bright fireball that had a bright green glow around it- fly through the sky for a couple seconds. it looked a lot like a falling star but much larger and brighter.  it also looked as if it were very close which could have been because of the size. strangely enough it truly had a bright green glow. anyone see it??
content.summary: Green fireball flying through the sky for a couple seconds till what it seemed a burn out

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing ufos on a regular basis with the blue light in my room and high strangeness. actually i was hearing knocks on my roof while writing this .And the night i got the picture of the entity i was hearing knocks at my backdooor during a meditation and prayer to cleanse my chakras and my home of negative energy and entities . and i stuck my digital camera out th e window took a pic expecting to catch a peeping tom. and also about a week earlier th e same shape was casting a shadow on my bedroom wall from outside my bedroom window .My eyes opened from a sleep and i saw the shadow moving back and forth without making noise in th e leaves out back my girlfriend saw it and tried to wake me but i was already watching it .It seemed to be hovering when it moved cuz it didnt strut moving back and forth in a strange way .When i finally got the courage to look out the window it must of known cuz it left before i even got a chance.I have had many ufo sightings and just last night i got a feeling to look at the sky and saw another star like ufo but ive seen triangles red and orange on m0re than one ocasion and with witnessed sightings of large white orbs one over my neighbors and it moved away when i saw it so fast it almost looked like it disapeared and another time i got a feeling to look at th e space station and saw two orbs go under it one after another and disapear .
content.summary: Picture of mist including entity

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down a hill near our house and noticed lights 3 lights hovering off in the distance, maybe a half mile away and 1000 feet high. it was one red light on the left and two white lights to the right. all solid no flashing. lights seemed connected. they hovered in the same exact spot for about 45 seconds. the seemed to start moving forward very slowly until they passed by our position. we pulled a u -turn to see where the lights were headed and followed them for about 5 seconds before they shot east at an extremely fast speed. we have never seen anything move quite like it. we both agree it was definitely not a standard aircraft. it was very low to the ground and moved in an extremely irregular fashion. hoping someone else saw it as well. no other aircraft visible in sky at time of sighting.
content.summary: Lights hover than jet east towards murfreesboro

content.detailedDescription: A  freind  of  mine  and  myself  were  walking  west  along  meadow  street, garden city, ny  on  a  cold  clear  evening.   we  were  walking  to  the  phone  booths  at  the  mobil gas  station  at  franklin  avenue, gc  to  call  our  girlfreinds.   in  those  days,  there  was  only  one  phone  in  the  house  and  we  didn't  want  to  call  our  girlfreinds  in  front  of  our  parents  and  siblings.   on  the  way  to  the  gas  station  i  looked up  toward  the  sound  of  a  jet  passing  overhead.   idelwild  (now : jfk) international  airport  is  not  far  away.   i  noticed  a  group  of  star like  points  of  light  moving  eastward  accross  the  sky.   i  remember  noticing  that  as  they  passed  the  background  stars,  the  stars  did  not  blink  out.   i  thought  that  was  odd.  as  they  continued  eastward,  they  got  to  a  point  where  the  group  made  a  hard  right  angle  and  shot  straight  south  with  tremendous  acceleration.  when  i  say  a  hard  right  angle  turn,  i  mean  a  turn  as  square  as  a  carpenter's  square.   we  both  immediately  realized  we  had  seen  something  extremely  strange.   we  then  hurridely  proceeded  to  the  phone  booths  at  the  mobil  gas  station  and  looked  through  the  phone  book  for  the  air  force.   we  called  a  number  and  attempted  to  report  our  sighting.   the  man  who  we  got  through  to  only  said,  "sorry  kids,  no  ufos  sheduled  for  tonight"  and  hung  up.   at  that  point  my  pal  got  freightened  and  said  that  we  should  not  tell  anyone  about  the  sighting.   as  far  as  i  know,  he  never  did  tell  anyone.  but  i  told  everyone  i  could.   no  one  beleives  me.  even  today,  i  still  tell  anyone  who  will  listen.
content.summary: Right angle turn  at  high  altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in the backyard grilling steaks when i looked up to the eastern sky and saw this very bright small cylinder shaped object moving from north to south. 

when first noticed, the object was at an azumith of about 75 degrees and an altitude of about 45 degrees. it faded a little as it moved south and was last seen about a minute later at an azumith of 135 degrees, altitude of 35-40 degrees.

there was no sound, no exhaust or contrails visible, and i did not notice any wings or attached lights. the sun was still about 10-15 degrees above the western horizon and the skies were only 10% cloud cover. temperature at my location about 60 with only light winds.

because of the objects small size, i had the impression that it was at a very high altitude and therfore moving quite fast. no other objects were seen in the sky at this time.

i have been an amateur astronomer for nearly 50 years, have a b.A. degree in astronomy, but have never seen an object like this before.
content.summary: Bright small cylinder

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house. we happened to be outside that night. we all love the way the clouds form when its about to thunderstorm. so we were all taking pictures. anyways to be honest nobody saw it. but later on after we had gone inside, one of my friends was going through her pictures and she showed it to me. she said to look closely at the picture because there was an orange circle in the picture next to the light post. i zoomed in and i yelled out, " ufo you guys look!!!" lol funny thing was that when we were all outside taking pictures, nobody saw it because we were goofing off. but the reason why i reacted like that was because that night the sky was full of grey clouds. there wasnt any airplanes or anything on there. i happen to have the app ufo report tracker and i searched may 22nd,2011 to see if anybody else saw it and yes people did catch it. check out the picture. theres an orange light post but thats not it. it's the very small orange circle towards the left side of it. :)
content.summary: Small orange circl

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures in downtown jackson michigan, i bracket my pictures (take 3 at a time at different exposures) for hdr imaging.  it takes less than a second to shoot a bracketing of 3 photos.  when i got home to process them, i noticed on one of the three bracketed photos was something to the right of this stone arch i was shooting.  i was angled up towards the sky with my canon 7d camera.  the craft is only on one of the three photos, i was also using a tripod.  i didnt notice anything while shooting the pictures, no sound, nothing to grab my attention.  i only noticed when i got home and started processing my photos.
content.summary: Not sure if its ufo, or secret aircraft. pilots have looked at my picture, and they dont know

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the car waiting for my wife to come out of the bakery. it was a beautiful clear sunny day with wispy clouds in the sky. i was sitting in the drivers seat (rh drive) and i opened up the sun roof to take in the day. i looked up an saw a thin black object shaped like a boomerang moving in a straight line from north to south. it was so high in the sky the distance was really hard to judge. at first glance i thought it was a bird, then i kept watching it and realised it was way too high and moving to fast to be a bird, i also thought it may be a jet or a plane but quickly eliminated these options as there was no sound or jet streams coming from the object. if i wasn't looking i would never have noticed the object.

i watched for about 20 seconds then called out to my wife to come outside and take a look at what i was seeing. i pointed out the object to her and she said 'what is that?' and i replied 'what do you see?' and she confirmed seeing a black boomerang shaped object also. we continued to watch it for another 20-30 seconds, as it moved further south i noticed that it jumped from left to right and back again a few times before disappearing. i was excited to see a ufo so clearly during daylight, but my wife was worried and visibly shaken after the event.

this is the second time i have viewed a ufo the first was in 1995 the object was triangle shaped and the sighting was at night. i was driving in a remote part of australia, and the object was flying low overhead and seemed to be keeping pace with my vehicle.

this is the third time my wife has viewed a ufo. the first was in 2006, at night, the object was shaped like a teardrop or upside-down ballon, and it moved upwards into the sky.
the second was in 2009, also at night, and it was two solid white lights that started at tree level and moved upwards, at a rapid speed, on a diagonal, into the sky.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo high in the sky in broad daylight, watched for 1min then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was watching thunderstorms too the southeast of wichita , when a ( flash ) caught my eye. i was thinking a jet mustve moved tilted its wing causing a flash against the sun. when i looked at the object it was verry hard too make out because of the distance i was observing, but the first impression i got was ( wait a minute ) i dont see wings. but i passed that thought off thinking i wasnt getting a good view because of the distance involved. i can only guess at the distance but i would estimate the distance at about 4 too 5 miles away at a height of about 20,000 feet.It really stood out in contrast because it was above the thunderstorms which was over 100 miles away, so consequently they wasnt high in the air from my perspective. also i was observing the object from the 7nth floor of a hospital. the disc stood out against the blue sky and the thunderstorm beneath it. so as i continued watching it kept a straight line moving from the southwest too the northeast. as i continued watching i still noticed no wings or tail section, also the most important thing that caught my eye was the fact the object left no cantrel behind it. sorry for my bad typing. the object continued northeast on a level flight straight. the duration was short but i can say for a certainty a. their was no wings or tailsection. 2. was on no normal flight plan that i have ever seen, even for wichita. 3. was circular and left no cantrel. i have lived in wichita for approxamately 4 years now and have observed the flight patterns for the air force base and civilian as well, and have never seen any planes or anything else fly in that space and especially at that altitude. almost forgot the last part too. the duration i observed was limited to just over a minute is all, unfortunatelly because the hospital tower  blocked my view so i lost sight of it behind the tallest part of the hospital. btw i just got my new glasses on 1 week ago and my sight is better than 20/20 so that part was good. i am prior navy  am am officially considered a expert lookout by the u.S.N. the object was almost impossible too make out at first but as it kind of came my way it became clearer and clearer till i could clearlly see it had no wings and no cantrel behind it. wish thier was more too report, it was short but interesting. my first feeling was a plane was getting tossed about by the storm, but that quicklly changed as it got nearer and nearer. i suppose that after i realized what it was i was looking at i got curious but at the same time creeped out by it.
content.summary: Circular object moving straight line reflecting sunlight off and on leaving no cantrel behind

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on 3rd floor balcony with 5 friends, looking at downtown minneapolis skyline from the southwest by mctc. drinking jones cola.
2. noticed light moving across two antenna of tallest building in state, behind it. like a helicopter but then it changed directions.
3. thought it was a helicopter but then it changed directions several times and appeared to be moving back and forth across the top of the ids building, from our vantage point. it was obviously off to the east.
4. it was a small yellow-gold light with a red light underneath. two of us think we saw the lights separate as it climbed, like the red dropped off from the yellow light. its motion was weaving fast back and forth, from the north to the south, above what we saw as the ids center but since it kept disappearing into the clouds we dont know how far away. msp and stp airport radar towers is who i would call if i were you.
5. i was incredulous but amazed and completely convinced that it was no aircraft i have ever seen. not a blimp, balloon, wasnt military testing of secret tech over a metro area before midnight. wasnt a helicopter. i felt sincerely like i had waited my entire life to see that.
6. it winked in and out back and forth, hiding in clouds and behind the ids center for many minutes. last we saw it it popped out from the left side of the ids building and disappeared into the clouds, about 15 minutes after first sighting. i who am writing this was the first to see it.
content.summary: Bright, yellow-gold light and smaller red light below it

content.detailedDescription: Hace algunos a���os 4 muchachos escalando un cerro, encontraron una cueva en una sierra a 30 km, al norte de caborca, en sonora, mex. se introdujeron el ella y a unos metros de haber entrado, notaron que la cueva era demasiado redonda, para ser una cueva normal, al avanzar un poco, vieron algo que los asusto demasiado, y salieron corriendo, huyendo de la cueva, era un animal, demasiado raro dijeron, regresaron a la ciudad,sin contar nada a nadie, hasta pasado el tiempo  segui insistiendo que me relataran el suceso, pero ya casi no lo recordaban, pero en abril de 2011 los convenci que se dejaran hipnotizar, empezaron a recordar todo con cada detalle, los regrese en el tiempo y la descripcion que obtuve de lo que vieron , fue la siguiente: dos de los muchachos iban m���s adelante que el resto, llevaban fuego tipo antorcha para ver en la obscuridad, cuando de repente, a unos pasos de ellos, y a un lado de un hoyo profundo de paredes muy lisas, estaba un ser parado  frente a ellos, no tenia  pelaje en su cuerpo ni en su cabeza, la cual era demasiada grande y como huevo ( ovalada ), no tenia orejas, pero tenia dos ojos grandisimos que les estaba mirando fijamente, apenas en cuanto movio la cabeza, para observarlos, no tenia colmillos o dientes a la vista, los brazos eran m���s bien delgados, pero los dedos eran extremadamente largos y muy raros, todo su cuerpo era de color aluminio( gris ), quedaron paralizados unos segundos, para despues salir huyendo los 4 muchachos y nunca querer regresar. a partir de esa fecha casi todos los dias m���s o menos de las 7:30  a las 9.00 de la noche he  estado observando la sierra desde el techo de mi casa o bien desde la pista donde voy a hacer mi caminata, y he observado en 4 ocaciones, una serie de luces color naranja que suben la sierra en 3 o 4 segundos, al  llegar arriba, toman una formacion como triangulo y luego desaparecen, pero hoy al estar observando, salieron dos luces naranja, y rodearon a algo como un circulo de luces azules y color naranja,que parpadeaban, despues hicieron una formacion y desaparecieron. estoy planeando hacer una incursion a la sierra con los muchachos a finales de junio, llevar camara, video y no se que m���s, aunque tengo miedo, ya que hoy al ver las luces, sentio una serie de escalofrios en todo el cuerpo.
content.summary: Luces que suben rapidamente una sierra

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard of the house.. i looked up in the eastern sky, a bright cigar shaped object was racing across the sky.  i yelled at my father to come outside. my father said "it's moving way too fast to be a plane, and there's no contrail".  after about 2 and a half minutes.. the object instantly vanished from sight.
content.summary: Ufo seen in the eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to report to you about a possible sighting i had saturday, may 21,2011 at about 12:30-1:00pm.  
  i was working in the railyard at north kansas city when one of  my coworkers called my attention to a bright light in the sky to the west. soon, one of my other coworkers saw it too. then we noticed at total of three of these objects.  two of them seemed closer and brighter than the third.  i would say about the size of a penny on the two and an asprin on the third.  we looked at them for a few minutes...Then decided to look again and they were gone.
 this was in broad daylight with a few puffy white clouds floating by.  the objects looked to be chrome or silver metalic like in color.  they did not move when i looked at them, but the guy who first noticed them said one moved quickly in a strait line and stopped.  two of the dots where close together and another was farther to the north.  i would say they were visible for about 5 minutes maybe.
content.summary: Three disks in bright dayllight

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was early this morning maybe around 1 am.  i went outside to smoke with my nursing assistant. i looked the south and there it was moving slowly across the sky in the south, moving from east to west. looked to not be flying all that high.  instantly i was shocked at what i saw. i told my assistant look at that triangle, i think we just saw a ufo! best i remember there was a light on each side of the back and a white light under the front.
it was some distance away but the shape was very distinct. 
we work night shift so i can't remember the exact hour. 
wow my first sighting and with a witness. i am located 6 miles north of dallas tx.
my occupation.....Nurse
content.summary: Triangle sighting

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out the window at the storm clouds and saw what i thought was a ballon or bird i jumped up and told the girl frin to come out side we ran out side and saw a disc shap object crossing the sky it was swaying back and forth from side to side as it keepet the same projectery
content.summary: Clacssie disc shape

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the sofa with a friend, watching television, when i was suddenly startled by something approaching from the my left.  i was inclined to look down when i spotted a black orb slowly floating about six inches above the floor.  it moved slowly, gently and soundlessly floated across the room.  when i first saw it, it was approaching the leather chair which is about 6' from where we were sitting, and most likely coming from the area of the kitchen and rear yard before that.  i stared at it until the orb reached the front entrance, but was approximately 3' away from the door.  it hovered in front of us for almost thirty seconds, then vanished before our eyes.  my friend and i looked at each other in sheer wonderment and surprise.  i uttered, "did you see that?"  he answered, "yes.  what was that?"  "i don't know," i replied.  "i know it's a sphere, but i have never seen it that color before.  it may be some form of new technology to gather information."  i went on to say that i feel like i'm being watched because of all the previous incidents i've had with vanishing objects as well as people throughout the course of my life.  they're probably trying to find out who you are and what is your purpose for being here.  i'm just speculating about who these people are.  thank god my friend wasn't thwarted by the sighting.  i haven't mentioned all my other sightings and experiences because of the negative stigma connected with ufo sightings.
content.summary: Black sphere, approximately 8-9 inches across.  it was not a shiny orb, but rather a flat dark charcoal color.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just started taking my daily morning walk along a busy pkway in las cruces, nm.  it was a clear, blue sky day.  about 8:35 a.M. the moon was pale in the morning sky.  no clouds.  i usually observe the beautiful morning weather and i live on a ridge so its hard to miss the sky ahead.

i live on a main parkway...Cars were driving by.  
i saw something in the sky.  at first i thought, that's not the shape of a plane.  it seemed white in the sun. egg or almond shape. the object was stationary.  i stopped walking.  the object stayed still as i watched it.  i knew it was not a star.  there were no stars in the sky.  
the object started to move ever so slightly.
i thought...I wonder if my camera can catch this?  it was kind of far away.  as i stood there and
started to retrieve my blackberry, i kept my eyes on the object.  the object started to simply fade and then disappear.  it was stationary when it disappeared.
i stayed looking at the sky thinking it would return.
as i was looking up...A car drove by and a girl yelled out of the window
"it's gone!".

i knew i was not the only one who saw it.  

i feel like it was an unidentified flying object. i wrote my children
and my best friend right away.  

i have only lived in new mexico for 3 weeks.  i have never seen anything
like that, that i can remember.  

after about 5 minutes as i continued my walk.  i saw a jet in the sky.  i thought...I wonder if someone reported the object.  i knew that the military sometimes sent up jets as a follow up to a report.
content.summary: Only object in completely clear blue sky in a.M. appeared stationary, disappered.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday afternoon, nearly at 1200, i stepped out into the back yard to take a panoramic photo of the mountains. i don't take many scenic pictures, however after looking out the window to the west, i decided to get the camera. the photo included with this report is a panoramic frame using three separate photos taken moments apart. in my mind that rules out a defect/debris on the lens (otherwise it would appear three times). my camera is a fujifilm finepix s1000 fd. it was mounted on a tripod at 12x optical zoom, and 3mb resolution. this photo was uploaded to facebook, and several of my family and friends "liked" it, or commented. sunday evening i was taking a second look at the picture when it became apparent that the screen on my computer was in need of a cleaning. that is when i detected the black spot on the right side of the frame. i could not identify the object in the picture. after magnifying the object on my screen it became clear to me that i was looking at something with a defined shape, but nothing familiar to me. we do see some air traffic here in the colorado springs area, and i was an aviation ordinance man in the marine corps. so, i'm good at aircraft identification. this object does not appear to me to be a bird, or aircraft, so i have decided to  report it as "unidentified", and "flying"...

i will upload two photos of the object.
first will be the original panorama photo, and second will be a cropped and magnified image of the object. in the original it will appear on the far right 1/3 of the frame as a black spot in the cloud. 

note: at no time did i detect this with my naked eye, and did not discover it in the the photo until a day later.
content.summary: Took a panoramic photograph of mountains, detected object in frame a day later.

content.detailedDescription: I work in a building in pasco. normally i have no reason to go outside but i was moving some equipment. as i rounded the corner of the building i looked up an noticed how bright the moon was and noted the one small cloud that was near it. i started to look away when three "stars" caught my eye. they seemed to appear below the cloud. i thought to my self that it was neat they formed a triangle..At that exact moment, they all started moving together. they seemed to be drifting...I watched as they all lowered slightly and silently,and drifted towards me and that's when i realized i was looking at one object with lights on it..It was not an airplane. it seemed to drift for a few seconds then pick up speed and flew off to my left (east i think). i was trying to keep my eyes on it and grab my iphone but gave up cause my iphone cant take pics in the dark. i think i stood there for a full min just stunned. i didnt mention it to anyone. i am waiting to see if i am the only one that saw it. this took place at exactly 3:42am
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three lights, triangle formation over tricities wa
